title: Game Scoop! 695: A Game of the Year Conundrum
description:
Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis, and John Davison -- are discussing Overwatch 2, the Xbox/Activision Blizzard acquisition, the Nintendo Seal of Quantity, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.

00:00:00 - Intro/Overwatch 2

00:07:53 - Xbox Calls PlayStation Too Big to Fail

00:19:30 - Two Never-Before-Seen NES Games Are Up for Auction

00:26:52 - The Nintendo Seal of Quantity

00:37:06 - The October 2000 issue of Official PlayStation Magazine

01:11:16 - Video Game 20 Questions
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis, Daemon Hatfield, John Davison)
